name: rls_references_user_metadata
title: RLS references user metadata
description: Detects when Supabase Auth user_metadata is referenced insecurely in a row level security (RLS) policy.
detail: Table \`public.products\` has a row level security policy \`Admins can view all products\` that references Supabase Auth \`user_metadata\`. \`user_metadata\` is editable by end users and should never be used in a security context.
